16  
17  package org.springframework.cache.interceptor;
18  
19  import org.springframework.aop.Pointcut;
20  import org.springframework.aop.framework.AbstractSingletonProxyFactoryBean;
21  import org.springframework.aop.support.DefaultPointcutAdvisor;
22  
23  /**
24   * Proxy factory bean for simplified declarative caching handling.
25   * This is a convenient alternative to a standard AOP
26   * {@link org.springframework.aop.framework.ProxyFactoryBean}
27   * with a separate {@link CacheInterceptor} definition.
28   *
29   * <p>This class is designed to facilitate declarative cache demarcation: namely, wrapping
30   * a singleton target object with a caching proxy, proxying all the interfaces that the
31   * target implements. Exists primarily for third-party framework integration.
32   * <strong>Users should favor the {@code cache:} XML namespace
33   * {@link org.springframework.cache.annotation.Cacheable @Cacheable} annotation.</strong>
34   * See the <a href="http://bit.ly/p9rIvx">declarative annotation-based caching</a> section
35   * of the Spring reference documentation for more information.
36   *
37   * @author Costin Leau
38   * @since 3.1
39   * @see org.springframework.aop.framework.ProxyFactoryBean
40   * @see CacheInterceptor
41   */
42  @SuppressWarnings("serial")
43  public class CacheProxyFactoryBean extends AbstractSingletonProxyFactoryBean {
44  
45  	private final CacheInterceptor cachingInterceptor = new CacheInterceptor();
46  
47  	private Pointcut pointcut;
48  
49  
50  	/**
51  	 * Set a pointcut, i.e a bean that can cause conditional invocation
52  	 * of the CacheInterceptor depending on method and attributes passed.
53  	 * Note: Additional interceptors are always invoked.
54  	 * @see #setPreInterceptors
55  	 * @see #setPostInterceptors
56  	 */
57  	public void setPointcut(Pointcut pointcut) {
58  		this.pointcut = pointcut;
59  	}
60  
61  	@Override
62  	protected Object createMainInterceptor() {
63  		this.cachingInterceptor.afterPropertiesSet();
64  		if (this.pointcut == null) {
65  			// Rely on default pointcut.
66  			throw new UnsupportedOperationException();
67  		}
68  		return new DefaultPointcutAdvisor(this.pointcut, this.cachingInterceptor);
69  	}
70  
71  	/**
72  	 * Set the sources used to find cache operations.
73  	 */
74  	public void setCacheOperationSources(CacheOperationSource... cacheOperationSources) {
75  		this.cachingInterceptor.setCacheOperationSources(cacheOperationSources);
76  	}
77  
78  }
